title: Worthless Regression
summary:
In Aeria, a place where people from various worlds are summoned, the weak are destined to die.

Lee Sungmin, a talentless mercenary, was no exception. Fortunately for him, a mysterious item he finds before his untimely death sends him back to the past.

Now a 13-year-old with a second chance at life, Sungmin begins his desperate journey to become Aeria's strongest with no money or talent.

Will effort alone be enough to make a hero of a boy with absolutely nothing?

title: Complicated Love In Tokyo
summary:
A collection of oneshots:

**Volume 1: BLACK CITY**
1. **Black City** - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Autumn Special, 1992
Jump debut work. Depicts the battle between psychics.
2. **Keita Futari** (恵太二人) - Weekly Shounen Jump #12, 1993
 	A work depicting an assassin with a dual personality. 
3. **Proto One** - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Autumn Special, 1995
Ichiro's daily life growing up in an ordinary family,
After meeting a boy who looks exactly like him, he begins to go crazy. 
4. **Jewel of Love** - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Winter Special, 1996 
Works depicting game characters that have become reality 

**Volume 2: TOKYO ANTS**
1. **Tokyo Ants** - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Akamaru Jump Winter, 2001
A special security group consisting of highly-skilled people rescues a hostage.
2. **ENMA** - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Akamaru Jump Summer, 1999
Depicts the exploits of a detective who has the ability to see through lies. 
3. **Enma** - Weekly Shounen Jump #25, 2000
Original work: Ton Okawara , prequel to “ENMA” 
4. **Chou: Swallow Tail** - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Akamaru Jump Winter, 1998
About a boy who can see swallowtail butterflies around people who are going to die.

**Volume 3: Snow in the Dark**
1. **MP0** - Weekly Shounen Jump 3-4#, 2005
The oneshot that will lead to [Mx0](https://mangadex.org/title/40129e2b-5197-4767-bea2-f20e7d7133e9). The names are different but the contents are the same.
2. **Shi Monkey** (し〜もんき〜) - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Akamaru Jump Summer, 2004
 A boy has come to a deserted island to meet his scientist father who is working on a top-secret experiment. There he meets a beautiful girl who knows him, but he doesn't know her.
3. **Snow in the Dark** - Weekly Shounen Jump Zoukan: Akamaru Jump Winter, 2004
 A one-shot fairy tale which shares many elements of the traditional story of Snow White but is certainly unique and complex enough that it is more than just a reinterpretation.
4. **Kirino Sako to Nakamatachi** (桐野佐亜子と仲間たち) - Weekly Shounen Jump 19-20#, 2004
Original work: Taisuke Ninohara. With criminals who abuse the supernatural power "Revelation", the story of a private office that confronts this

title: Remember the Time-Limited Grand Duchess
summary:
For Grand Duke Heverus, marriage was nothing more than a means to an end. His union with Leticia, an adopted daughter of a count’s family, began just as simply, a one year contractual marriage. But the Grand Duke slowly grew attached to Leticia, and just as he was about to confess his feelings after returning from the battlefield, he was struck with shock. 

Leticia had already died from a terminal illness. 

Regretting his own indifference, he risked his life and used the power of ancient magic to turn back time. This time, he is determined to save Leticia, to grant her happiness, and so he proposes the contractual marriage once more. 

But there’s a problem. 

Merely watching her isn’t enough. He wants her. Forever.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: The Duchess’s Secret Dressing Room
summary:
*How much money must I spend for you to divorce me?!*

Rubika dies in a war without being able to confess her love for Arman but is instead sent back in time. A new life, she will not live in vain. But what are these new obstacles?

---
*'If I had known sooner that life would never wait, I wouldn't have hesitated so much...'*

After living a hard life in the ravaged war ruins, Rubica dies without even confessing to her beloved Armand.

But what is this?

At the age of 22, with Armand’s ring, Rubica returned to the pre-war period. After returning, Rubica tries to find Armand who may be alive but is caught by the proposal of her kingdom's supreme ruler, the Duke of Claymore.

Rubica, who eventually became the duchess because of her greedy uncle and aunt, now plans to squander her husband's fortune, be disgraced as a 'luxurious duchess,’ and get him to divorce her.

However, contrary to what she intended, her fame rises due to her overflowing talent, and her husband, who she thought was indifferent to her, slowly begins to take an interest in her... Where is the end of her luxury, which began to flow in a direction she never expected?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16662/)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)

title: Lantern Of The Dawn
summary: While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

title: The Black Diary
summary:
Fantasy series of short stories that involves animals:  
  
Pet Doctor Atsushi Kirishima meets a cat-guy with tail, cat ears and an injured eye when he is searching for his runaway patient animal. Atsushi can not leave the cat-guy and takes the guy to his animal hospital with him.   
  
Hattori, an apprentice of Atsushi's father, Kenzou finds a dog in the mountains and brings it back in a car. On the way home the dog changes into a girl.  
  
The titles stories are:  
  
The Sounds of a Bell Can Be Heard  
The Cat's Love  
A Flicker of Light (two parts)  
Amber's Diary (also known as Kohaku's Diary)  
The Delicate Pair (also known as Every Subtlety)  
(Black Cat + White Dog) > Human  
  
Trouble Little Traveler  
A cute unrelated shoujo short story about a boy meeting tiny aliens.

title: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family
summary:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?

title: Another Heaven
summary:
An angel made a mistake, resulting in Shiihara Daiki’s death. In order to hide the mistake, he was then sent to a different world. The angel will grant him one wish as a payment for keeping it a secret. Daiki asked for a Heavenly Castle floating in the sky without hesitation.  
Suddenly a floating castle appeared in the new world, which causes confusion amongst the people. They attempt to contact Daiki in various ways. A country tries to steal it by force, while another seeks to befriend him. What in the world would Daiki do?

title: Loved by The Dead
summary:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Manyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline.
___
[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

title: I Got A Job At A Haunted Mansion
Surviving as a PD Idol
summary:
A notorious PD, despised by everyone, becomes an unknown idol in a parallel world.
Only his younger sibling remembers him fully.
To return to his original world, he must become a top idol and clear the game!

"...Quest accepted."
"Are you crazy?"
"Gotta eat to live, don't I?"

His specialty is intimidation, his hobby is persuasion.
The idol survival story of a ruthless PD who stops at nothing!

title: Born a Princess
summary:
‘Less than a month old… I became the great empire’s treasured princess…!’
In all my life, I wanted love. Love from my family, But the family I had, failed me in the end. Abandoned… abused… I don’t want this so-called family. It’s a waste of time.
I came to a new world after a miserable ending…
‘The empire’s treasured princess… that’s me… but why is father, the emperor, so strange?’
“Mabel, I will give you the Ponce Castle.”
“My sweet child, the most fertile land is yours.”
“No, wait, this whole country will be yours for the plucking.”
‘Father, he’s strange… is this what family love is like?

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: The Abandoned Saintess’s Vow: To Deny the Prince’s Love in Her Next Life
After Improperly Licking a Dog, I Became a Billionaire
summary: Once a typical simp, Lin Xin’s life takes a drastic turn when he’s dumped and inherits a divine financial system—starting him off with a whopping trillion yuan! But there’s a twist: he can only spend this fortune on women. Stuck with this bizarre stipulation, Lin Xin is forced to navigate an unconventional and thrilling path to wealth and power, transforming from a mere simp to a legendary tycoon.

title: At the Duke’s Command
summary: Poisoned to death by her own betrothed?! Eunha didn’t wake up in a novel’s story just to get killed off again as an unfortunate extra! To change her story she needs a cover… 6 months pretending to be the fake fiancée of the novel's male protagonist, Duke Noah Wynknight. But will this cold-hearted, angel-faced demon of a man really help her avoid another ill-fated ending?!

title: Chronicle of Runes
summary:
In a world where Runecraft thrives, Van is born with the Asura Rune, the most accursed rune in history, said to bring only ruin.

When a sorcerer coveting its power strikes, Van loses everything and is sealed inside a pocket dimension, severed from the mortal realm. Drowning in despair yet fueled by unquenchable rage, he refuses to die.

For 999 years, he hones his blade of vengeance. At last, he unlocks the Asura Rune’s true power, tears open his prison, and returns to the world, bringing destruction with him.

title: Talent-Swallowing Magician
summary:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

---

- [T.Chinese](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%99%AC%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%B8%AB/399)

title: The Godly Son-in-Law of the Nation
summary: Five years ago, his father’s company was framed by someone, and he lost his money. Jiang Beichen suffered humiliation in front of his relatives in order to treat his father’s illness, and was even ruthlessly abandoned by his fiancee, and finally sank into the river. Five years later, he added glory to his body and returned strong. Not only did he sweep away all abuses and avenge his father, but he also stood on the top of Kyushu, overlooking the world.

title: I’m A Super Rich Man, So It’s Reasonable For Me To Be A Scumbag
summary: Jiang Cheng woke up and was reborn! He was also bound to the Godly Rich System. Every second the world runs, he can get money! As the system continues to upgrade, Jiang Cheng's wealth has skyrocketed. All the cool school beauties and queen bosses are around him. Jiang Cheng laughed up to the sky. In his previous life, he was trapped by the things that he couldn't get when he was young for so long. Now that he is reborn, who cares about those broken rules! Let's drink and enjoy it first.

title: Serpent Ancestor
summary:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.

title: The Fields of Obers
summary:
A compilation of loosely-connected stories about weird highschoolers. Several of the stories focus on Hayashi, an aloof and forthright student, while others focus on Nikaidou, a student with a downcast and grim persona.

**Contents:**
1. Someone Cute
2. Would You Be My Friend?
3. The Artist
4. Run, Yamada!
5. Nikaidou Behind Me
6. Nikaidou Extra
7. Nikaidou Behind Me: Angry Class Ver.
8. Nikaidou Behind Me: Terrifying Class Trip Ver.

**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in the Short Work category in 2020.
- Won the New Face Award from the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival in 2020.

title: I Became a Civil Servant in a Magical World
summary:
"Monday? Hate it. Tuesday? Hate it. And what I hate the most? Going to work."
The civil servant Hae Sunal feels this way. In his previous life, all he wished for was to be able to use magic as normally as anyone else, so he invented a way for it to happen… In his next life. But now that he's in this new life, due to ‘magic’, he’s been living a far noisier life than expected.
“Hello, I am Hae Sunal, a member of the Special Department for Cross-Species Civil Complaints and Resolution.”

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: She Becomes Glamorous After The Engagement Annulment
How to Live as an Illegal Healer
Boundless Necromancer
summary:
[The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth.  Please select your difficulty.]

Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”

Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.

Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when he accepts an invitation to join the Tower of Trials, an otherworldly realm where challengers must overcome trials that pit them against monsters and humans alike!

title: Which Wizard Will Kill Me
summary: Life at Papilon, the elite magic school, is full of hardships for Rhea who's failing in every possible way. One day, when her hidden friendship with the top-student and her childhood friend Sion gets discovered by the mysterious transfer student, Joon, Rhea can’t help but notice the energy of death surrounding him… Who will be the wizard to kill her?!

title: Farming in Beast World: My Villainous Snake Cubs are Super Clingy
True Education
summary:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5620215)

+++Ch. 125 drama
After the publication of ch. 125, the manhwa was suspended "indefinitely" and the Korean ch. 125 was removed while the official English translation was completely taken down. The hiatus lasted 100 days.

By [@webtoonofficial](https://www.tiktok.com/@webtoonofficial) on Tiktok

By the creators:
![Creators statement](https://forums.mangadex.org/attachments/creator-notice-png.6921/)
+++

title: Legendary Doctor Princess Has the Crow’s Beak
The Symbiotic Relationship Between the Rabbit and the Black Panther
summary:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?

title: Moonstruck
summary: If you love someone, what kind of things might you do? The desire to destroy even while in love, the dilemma of wanting to ruin a love that grows deeper. This is a deeply probing collection of high-stimulation romance short stories titled Moonstruck, exploring how dangerous the emotion of love can sometimes be.

title: In the Name of Your Death
summary:
1) Covetous You and Insensible Me (Hoshigariana Kimi to Futsutsukana Boku)  
Never one to get close to strangers, Kai finds himself helpess in the enchanting gaze of a foreigner…  
  
2) Lost in the Darkness Before Dawn (Gyou An ni Mayou)  
Tatsumi Hiroaki is a swordsman for hire during the Edo Period. Recently, a rise in bandit activity has given him a steady flow of work in protecting small shops in town. The bandits recognize his skill and offer to hire him, where he finds a familiar face from the past.  
  
3) Confession (Kokuhaku)  
Unable to forget the random act of kindness by the wealthy, but lonely business man, Matsumi offers to sell his body. Is it really just for money, or is there a greater need at stake?  
  
4) The night he escaped death (Shi ni Zokonai no Yoru)  
Prequel of Lost in the Darkness Before Dawn.  
  
5) Sleepless Night  
The Night He Escaped Death bonus.  
  
6) Service  
Confession bonus.  
  
7) Bonds of Blood  
Covetous You and Insensible Me bonus.

title: I Can’t Escape From My Contract Husband’s Doting Love
Two Out of Three Revenge Targets Are Obsessed with Me
Pseudo Love
summary: Baek Ga-in is a university student doing multiple jobs, living a double life as a demon worship concept streamer 'Lucia.' She has been carrying past scars of being entangled within a cult but suddenly her stream attracts a real demon, an 'incubus'?! A demon, human and... an angel?! This is not a 'cult' it is that campus fantasy romance!!

title: Miss Pendleton
summary:
If love is the ultimate prize, then the perils of courtship are the necessary trials and tribulations one must endure in its pursuit. 

It is a blessing for the society debutantes of London, then, that Cupid’s arrow should be guided by the dainty hand of Miss Laura Pendleton, granddaughter of Countess Pendleton and the city’s finest matchmaker. 

When Laura’s self-ascribed duties call her to befriend the stoic and saturnine Mr. Ian Dalton of Whitefield, however, she soon finds that when it comes to the grand contest of love, it may well be every woman for herself…

title: Situationship
summary:
"Yoonjae," who's in their first year of being a solo act and doesn't like dating, but still wants physical affection, encounters the arrival of "Minseok" at their company, who seems popular with everyone. 

Minseok suggests going out for drinks separately with Yoonjae, but there are no texts asking if Yoonjae got home safely. Minseok's attitude is ambiguous, mixing pleasant words with drawing boundaries. 

They share meals, watch movies, and have physical contact, yet they're not officially dating. What kind of relationship are we in? Something other than dating for us in our 30s.

title: Perfect Show Window
summary:
Are we allowed to be so excited?
A 9pm curfew, no short skirts, no independence unless married.
K-Hee-won grew up in a Confucian family and dreamed of freedom.
K - Jihwan, the son of a serf, fights to keep the family name alive.
Will their daring plan for freedom succeed?

title: You Were My Slave
summary:
The slave she thought was dead has returned—as a king. Now, he takes her as his concubine to destroy her kingdom and avenge his past.

"My love wounds him. His love condemns me."

---
The princess’s slave, thought to be dead, returned to her as a great king. To destroy the country for enslaving him. To seek revenge on the woman who got him killed. Picking at each other’s wounds, not realizing it all started with a misunderstanding.

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary:
Luke Foster thought he was doomed when he awakened as a Dragon Tamer, the most useless hidden profession in existence. 

Dragons are so rare and powerful that for eight centuries, no Dragon Tamer has ever succeeded in taming a dragon. But without one, he can't even unlock his basic skills, leaving him powerless in a world ruled by fighters. 
Then everything changes after Luke activates the **Super Treasure Map System**. The mysterious system leads him to the ultimate prize: a real dragon egg! And so, this "***weak***" Dragon Tamer is about to flip the world upside down.

title: Madam and Her Daily Online Face-Slapping
summary: The Gu family, the leader of the Jijing Continent, was plotted against, and the family was separated. The head of the young family, Gu Mang, took her younger brother, Gu Si, disguising themselves, to regain power, beat the villain, avenge the family, gain glory, and pick up the top handsome president along the way.
